column1: Local Foods////I'm also not a fan of duck
column2: but their duck confit surprised me with it's layers of flavor. I never believed in "good" sandwiches either. It's just bread and meat and a thing of lettuce
column4: so wrong and I didn't see the light until I had the privilege of devouring their crunchy chicken sandwich
column5: which is a symphony of salty
column7: and sweet-mother-of-marbles-I-can-die-happy wedged between a pretzel bun. Yes. I just said that. A pretzel bun.
